If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`. params._groupId: Group id of the group to accept invite for
params._penultimateKeysFor: Addresses for which updated penultimate shared keys are meant for
params._penultimateKeysXUpdated: Array of X coordinates of updated penultimate shared key corresponding to `_penultimateKeysFor`
params._penultimateKeysYUpdated: Array of Y coordinates of updated penultimate shared key corresponding to `_penultimateKeysFor`
params._timestampForWhichUpdatedKeysAreMeant: Timestamp at which the invitee checked the last updated penultimate keys

params._groupId: Group id of the group to accept invite for
params._groupParticipant: Group participant who wants to accept group invite
params._penultimateKeysFor: Addresses for which updated penultimate shared keys are meant for
params._penultimateKeysXUpdated: Array of X coordinates of updated penultimate shared key corresponding to `_penultimateKeysFor`
params._penultimateKeysYUpdated: Array of Y coordinates of updated penultimate shared key corresponding to `_penultimateKeysFor`
params._signatureFromGroupParticipant: Signature from participant against which to confirm input params against
params._timestampForWhichUpdatedKeysAreMeant: Timestamp at which the invitee checked the last updated penultimate keys

params._groupId: Group id of the group to accept invite for
params._groupParticipant: Group participant who wants to accept group invite
params._penultimateKeysFor: Addresses for which updated penultimate shared keys are meant for
params._penultimateKeysXUpdated: Array of X coordinates of updated penultimate shared key corresponding to `_penultimateKeysFor`
params._penultimateKeysYUpdated: Array of Y coordinates of updated penultimate shared key corresponding to `_penultimateKeysFor`
params._signatureFromGroupParticipant_r: r component of signature from participant against which to confirm input params against
params._signatureFromGroupParticipant_s: s component of signature from participant against which to confirm input params against
params._signatureFromGroupParticipant_v: v component of signature from participant against which to confirm input params against
params._timestampForWhichUpdatedKeysAreMeant: Timestamp at which the invitee checked the last updated penultimate keys

createGroup(address[],uint256,uint256,ui.details: Creates a new group, and sets it up for accepting (i.e, arriving at the final penultimate shared key)

params._groupParticipantsOtherThanCreator: Array of group participants other than group creator
params._initialPenultimateSharedKeyForCreatorX: X coordinate of initial value of penultimate shared key to use for creator, i.e, RANDOM * G
params._initialPenultimateSharedKeyForCreatorY: Y coordinate of initial value of penultimate shared key to use for creator, i.e, RANDOM * G
params._initialPenultimateSharedKeyFromCreatorX: X coordinate of initial value of penultimate shared key to use for all participants other than creator, i.e, Creator private key * RANDOM * G
params._initialPenultimateSharedKeyFromCreatorY: Y coordinate of initial value of penultimate shared key to use for all participants other than creator, i.e, Creator private key * RANDOM * G

createGroupForDelegator(address,address[.details: Creates a new group on behalf of delegator, and sets it up for accepting (i.e, arriving at the final penultimate shared key)

params._groupCreator: Address of the group creator (Delegator in this case)
params._groupParticipantsOtherThanCreator: Array of group participants other than group creator
params._initialPenultimateSharedKeyForCreatorX: X coordinate of initial value of penultimate shared key to use for creator, i.e, RANDOM * G
params._initialPenultimateSharedKeyForCreatorY: Y coordinate of initial value of penultimate shared key to use for creator, i.e, RANDOM * G
params._initialPenultimateSharedKeyFromCreatorX: X coordinate of initial value of penultimate shared key to use for all participants other than creator, i.e, Creator private key * RANDOM * G
params._initialPenultimateSharedKeyFromCreatorY: Y coordinate of initial value of penultimate shared key to use for all participants other than creator, i.e, Creator private key * RANDOM * G
params._signatureFromDelegator: Signature from delegator against which to confirm input params against

createGroupForDelegator(address,address[.details: Creates a new group on behalf of delegator, and sets it up for accepting (i.e, arriving at the final penultimate shared key)

params._groupCreator: Address of the group creator (Delegator in this case)
params._groupParticipantsOtherThanCreator: Array of group participants other than group creator
params._initialPenultimateSharedKeyForCreatorX: X coordinate of initial value of penultimate shared key to use for creator, i.e, RANDOM * G
params._initialPenultimateSharedKeyForCreatorY: Y coordinate of initial value of penultimate shared key to use for creator, i.e, RANDOM * G
params._initialPenultimateSharedKeyFromCreatorX: X coordinate of initial value of penultimate shared key to use for all participants other than creator, i.e, Creator private key * RANDOM * G
params._initialPenultimateSharedKeyFromCreatorY: Y coordinate of initial value of penultimate shared key to use for all participants other than creator, i.e, Creator private key * RANDOM * G
params._signatureFromDelegator_r: r component of signature from delegator against which to confirm input params against
params._signatureFromDelegator_s: s component of signature from delegator against which to confirm input params against
params._signatureFromDelegator_v: v component of signature from delegator against which to confirm input params against

didParticipantAcceptGroupInvite(uint256,.details: Returns `true` if a participant has accepted a group invite

params._groupId: Group id of the group to check in
params._participant: Participant whose acceptance is to be checked

getDelegatorNonce(address).details: Gets a delegator's next allowed nonceDelegators must use this to sign anything

getGroupPenultimateSharedKeyLastUpdateTi.details: Gets timestamp when a group's penultimate shared keys were last updated

returns.timestamp: Timestamp when a group's penultimate shared keys were last updated

getOtherGroupParticipants(uint256).details: Searches through group and finds all other group participants (excluding the participant who's invoking this)

getParticipantGroupPenultimateSharedKey(.details: Gets a participant's penultimate shared key for a group id

params._groupId: Group id to use to fetch penultimate shared key
params._groupParticipant: Group participant for whom to fetch the penultimate shared key

returns.penultimateSharedKeyX: X coordinate of penultimate shared key of group participant; Participant 1 * Participant 2 ... * RANDOM * G
returns.penultimateSharedKeyY: Y coordinate of penultimate shared key of group participant; Participant 1 * Participant 2 ... * RANDOM * G

getParticipantsGroupPenultimateSharedKey.details: Gets a participant's penultimate shared key for a group id

params._groupId: Group id to use to fetch penultimate shared key
params._groupParticipants: Array of group participants for whom to fetch the penultimate shared keys

returns.penultimateSharedKeysX: Array of X coordinate of penultimate shared keys of group participants; Participant 1 * Participant 2 ... * RANDOM * G
returns.penultimateSharedKeysY: Array of Y coordinate of penultimate shared keys of group participants; Participant 1 * Participant 2 ... * RANDOM * G

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

getVersion().details: Gets contract version, at correct slot

grantPebbleAdminRole(address).details: Grants Pebble admin role to an addressCan only be called by Role admin of Pebble admin role, for obvious reasons

params._pebbleAdminNew: New address to be granted Pebble admin role

grantPebbleDelegateeRole(address).details: Grants Pebble Delegatee role to an addressCan only be called by Role admin of Delegatee role, for obvious reasons

params._delegateeNew: New address to be granted Delegatee role

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokePebbleAdminRole(address).details: Revokes Pebble admin role from an addressCan only be called by Role admin of Pebble admin role, for obvious reasons

params._pebbleAdminToRevoke: Pebble admin role holder to revoke

revokePebbleDelegateeRole(address).details: Revokes Delegatee role from an addressCan only be called by Role admin of Delegatee role, for obvious reasons

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

sendMessageInGroup(uint256,bytes).details: Sends a message from Sender in a group

params._encryptedMessage: Encrypted message to send (MUST BE ENCRYPTED BY SHARED KEY, NOT PENULTIMATE SHARED KEY; SHARED KEY = SENDER PRIVATE KEY * SENDER PENULTIMATE SHARED KEY; THIS MUST BE CALCULATED LOCALLY)
params._groupId: Group id of the group to send message in

sendMessageInGroupForDelegator(uint256,a.details: Sends a message from Sender in a group

params._encryptedMessage: Encrypted message to send (MUST BE ENCRYPTED BY SHARED KEY, NOT PENULTIMATE SHARED KEY; SHARED KEY = SENDER PRIVATE KEY * SENDER PENULTIMATE SHARED KEY; THIS MUST BE CALCULATED LOCALLY)
params._groupId: Group id of the group to send message in
params._sender: Sender who wants to send message
params._signatureFromSender: Signature from sender against which to confirm input params against

sendMessageInGroupForDelegator(uint256,a.details: Sends a message from Sender in a group

params._encryptedMessage: Encrypted message to send (MUST BE ENCRYPTED BY SHARED KEY, NOT PENULTIMATE SHARED KEY; SHARED KEY = SENDER PRIVATE KEY * SENDER PENULTIMATE SHARED KEY; THIS MUST BE CALCULATED LOCALLY)
params._groupId: Group id of the group to send message in
params._sender: Sender who wants to send message
params._signatureFromSender_r: r component of signature from sender against which to confirm input params against
params._signatureFromSender_s: s component of signature from sender against which to confirm input params against
params._signatureFromSender_v: v component of signature from sender against which to confirm input params against
